page.description: Public user defined function. The A5_SHOW_VARIABLE() displays a dialog box with tabs showing the values of each of the currently defined variables.

argument.name: variable_name
argument.description: The variable or interest or a pointer to the variable frame, such as LOCAL_VARIABLES(), GLOBAL_VARIABLES()or SESSION_VARIABLES().

argument.name: dlg_title
argument.description: Optional. The title of the resulting dialog box. Character

page.example: dim aa as C aa = "Fred" ? a5_show_variable(local_variables() , "Currently Defined Variables") dim hah as C hah = "Hello" a5_show_variable(hah)
